extNameShort.description: The short title of the extension.

featured.description: Text for game page, between the title and Play button

blacklisted.message:
This game is unsupported or blacklisted.
Those games usually preventing GuestPlay users to play.

Continue?
blacklisted.description: Tell user that the game is unsupported

launchFailed.message:
Failed to launch the game.
Please try again later or contact developers about that.

saveFailed.message:
Failed to save preferences.
Please reload this page or contact developers about that.

error404.message:
No accounts available now.
Please try again later or change the character.

error500.message:
GuestPlay Service has occured an unknown error.
Please try again later.

error503.message:
GuestPlay Service is unavailable or overloaded.
Please come back later.

error526.message:
GuestPlay BETA Service is disabled.
Please switch to stable version of GuestPlay.
